name: Proto Tower 306
description:
Some pulsing stars. While creating this one I discovered the feature in Aseprite where you can move the animation pane to a vertical column on the left, rather than the horizontal portion on the bottom. Really made it easier to vizualize some stuff, so excited about this new little unlock in productivity.‚≠ê
